resources.string: %1$s you are sitting home and chilling with Netflix, when suddenly there is power outage. You hear a sound coming from the kitchen of someone saying your name, as well as the sound of knife sharpening.

You have ran away from the house, but you see %1$s and %1$s asks you to tell him what has happened. After hearing your story, %1$s says that you are only tripping and suggests to nicely return home and see if someone is actually in the house.
You decide to enter anyway. %1$s suggests for you two to look for the maniac separately.
Where do you want to run away? Forest is a shortcut to the city. However the road to the city is laminated.
You decide to stay. What will you do? You want to go check or you’re scared?
Classic! %1$s has tripped! You should know that %2$s is clumsy.
Since when, the right thing to do is to separate, %1$s? That is the most important rule of the horror films (not to do)!
You and %1$s managed to defeat the maniac!
You chose the safe path. %1$s you are lucky, your see your neighbor in the car and he offers to give you and %2$s a ride.
Do you really think it’s clever to go directly to the maniac?
Where do you think he is going to look first?
Who has ever survived having tripped in the forest?
You honestly think that traitors get to survive? Shame on you %1$s!
